hard.question: Which of the following HTTP methods is idempotent, meaning that performing the same request multiple times will have the same effect as performing it once?
options: GET
POST
PUT
DELETE

hard.question: What is the purpose of a CSS preprocessor like Sass or Less?
options: To compile JavaScript code
To optimize images for the web
To enhance the performance of web servers
To simplify and extend CSS with variables, mixins, and functions
hard.answer: To simplify and extend CSS with variables, mixins, and functions

hard.question: Which of the following is NOT a valid way to include JavaScript code in an HTML document?
options: Inline script tag
External script file linked with the src attribute
Using the script element with type="module"
Including JavaScript directly within the CSS file
hard.answer: Including JavaScript directly within the CSS file

hard.question: What is the purpose of the "viewport" meta tag in HTML?
options: To specify the author of the webpage
To define the structure of the webpage
To control the layout and scaling of the viewport on mobile browsers
To provide metadata about the webpage for search engines
hard.answer: To control the layout and scaling of the viewport on mobile browsers

hard.question: Which of the following is NOT a valid HTTP status code?
options: 200 OK
404 Not Found
303 See Other
500 Internal Server Error

hard.question: What is the purpose of the "box-sizing" CSS property?
options: To specify the color of the border around an element
To control the display of an element as a block or inline
To include or exclude an element's padding and border from its total width and height
To specify the font family used for text within an element
hard.answer: To include or exclude an element's padding and border from its total width and height

hard.question: Which of the following is NOT a valid type of CSS selector?
options: Class selector
ID selector
Tag selector
Range selector

hard.question: What is the purpose of the "defer" attribute in the script element?
options: To indicate that the script should be executed asynchronously
To delay the loading of the script until after the document has been parsed
To specify the character encoding of the script file
To disable the caching of the script file
hard.answer: To delay the loading of the script until after the document has been parsed

hard.question: Which of the following is a valid way to define a CSS variable?
options: @variable { color: blue; }
$variable: blue;
--variable: blue;
#variable = blue;

hard.question: What is the purpose of the "aria-" attributes in HTML?
options: To define custom animations for elements
To specify alternative text for images
To provide additional information about the accessibility and semantics of elements for screen readers and other assistive technologies
To control the layout of elements within a webpage
hard.answer: To provide additional information about the accessibility and semantics of elements for screen readers and other assistive technologies

medium_hard.question: What is the purpose of CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) in web development?
options: To prevent caching of web resources by the browser
To allow or restrict access to resources from different origins
To compress web resources for faster loading
To encrypt data transmitted between the client and server
medium_hard.answer: To allow or restrict access to resources from different origins

medium_hard.question: Which of the following is NOT a valid HTTP status code for a successful response?
options: 200 OK
301 Moved Permanently
404 Not Found
500 Internal Server Error

medium_hard.question: What is the purpose of HTTPS (Hypertext Transfer Protocol Secure) in web development?
options: To improve the performance of web applications
To encrypt data transmitted between the client and server
To handle asynchronous requests from the client
To optimize web resources for faster loading
medium_hard.answer: To encrypt data transmitted between the client and server

medium_hard.question: Which of the following is NOT a valid method for storing session data in web development?
options: Cookies
Local storage
Session storage
URL parameters

medium_hard.question: What is the purpose of the 'async' attribute in the script element?
options: To specify that the script should be executed asynchronously
To delay the loading of the script until after the document has been parsed
To specify the character encoding of the script file
To disable the caching of the script file
medium_hard.answer: To specify that the script should be executed asynchronously

medium_hard.question: What is the purpose of the 'box-sizing' CSS property?
options: To specify the color of the border around an element
To control the display of an element as a block or inline
To include or exclude an element's padding and border from its total width and height
To specify the font family used for text within an element
medium_hard.answer: To include or exclude an element's padding and border from its total width and height

medium_hard.question: What does the term 'responsive design' refer to in web development?
options: Designing websites with dynamic content that changes based on user interactions
Designing websites with visually appealing graphics and animations
Designing websites that adapt to different screen sizes and devices
Designing websites with fast loading times
medium_hard.answer: Designing websites that adapt to different screen sizes and devices

options: Class selector
ID selector
Tag selector
Range selector

options: To specify the author of the webpage
To define the structure of the webpage
To control the layout and scaling of the viewport on mobile browsers
To provide metadata about the webpage for search engines
medium_hard.answer: To control the layout and scaling of the viewport on mobile browsers

options: Pixel (px)
Percentage (%)
Em
Volt (V)

easy.question: Which programming language is commonly used for client-side scripting in web development?
options: Python
Java
JavaScript
C#

easy.question: What does CSS stand for in web development?
options: Cascading Style Sheets
Centralized Style Syntax
Cascading Script Styles
Creative Styling System

easy.question: What is the purpose of a CSS framework in web development?
options: To define the structure and behavior of web pages
To provide pre-designed and reusable CSS styles for building websites
To handle server-side operations in web applications
To manage databases in web development
easy.answer: To provide pre-designed and reusable CSS styles for building websites

easy.question: Which of the following is NOT a commonly used frontend framework in web development?
options: React
Angular
Vue.js
Django

easy.question: What is the purpose of a JavaScript library like jQuery in web development?
options: To define the structure and behavior of web pages
To provide pre-designed and reusable CSS styles for building websites
To handle server-side operations in web applications
To simplify DOM manipulation and event handling
easy.answer: To simplify DOM manipulation and event handling

easy.question: Which of the following is NOT a commonly used backend framework in web development?
options: Node.js
Django
Ruby on Rails
Laravel

easy.question: What is the purpose of a web server in web development?
options: To define the structure and behavior of web pages
To store and manage user data
To handle client requests and serve web pages to users
To manage databases in web development
easy.answer: To handle client requests and serve web pages to users

easy.question: What is the purpose of a database in web development?
options: To define the structure and behavior of web pages
To handle client requests and serve web pages to users
To store and manage user data
To provide pre-designed and reusable CSS styles for building websites
easy.answer: To store and manage user data

easy.question: Which of the following is NOT a commonly used database management system in web development?
options: MySQL
MongoDB
SQLite
Apache

easy.question: What is the purpose of AJAX in web development?
options: To provide pre-designed and reusable CSS styles for building websites
To simplify DOM manipulation and event handling
To handle asynchronous HTTP requests and update parts of a web page without reloading the entire page
To manage databases in web development
easy.answer: To handle asynchronous HTTP requests and update parts of a web page without reloading the entire page
